abstracts.cdata!:
The Road Maintenance Project will assist
            in financing: (a) a four-year highway maintenance program,
            and (b) feasibility studies for about 300 kilometers of
            roads, with subsequent detailed engineering for about 150
            kilometers of high priority road sections.
